name: claude-for-frappe
description: AI-powered bridge connecting Claude Desktop to Frappe ERP via Frappe Assistant Core
long_description: This extension creates an intelligent bridge between Claude Desktop and your Frappe ERP system through the Frappe Assistant Core app. Enable AI-powered data analysis, automated report generation, and natural language interactions with your business data.

tools.name: generate_report
tools.description: Execute pre-built business reports (Sales Analytics, P&L, etc.) with 183+ available reports across modules

tools.name: report_list
tools.description: Browse and discover available business reports across Selling, Accounts, Stock, and HR modules

tools.name: report_requirements
tools.description: Get required filters and structure information for any business report

tools.name: list_documents
tools.description: Search and list documents with filtering and pagination

tools.name: get_document
tools.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific document by name

tools.name: create_document
tools.description: Create new documents (Customer, Invoice, Item, etc.)

tools.name: update_document
tools.description: Modify existing document field values

tools.name: delete_document
tools.description: Remove documents from the system with permission checks

tools.name: submit_document
tools.description: Submit documents to change status from draft to submitted

tools.name: search_documents
tools.description: Global search across all accessible documents

tools.name: search_doctype
tools.description: Search within a specific DocType with filters

tools.name: search_link
tools.description: Search for link field options and references

tools.name: get_doctype_info
tools.description: Get DocType schema, metadata, and field definitions

tools.name: run_workflow
tools.description: Execute workflow actions (approve, reject, etc.) on documents

tools.name: run_python_code
tools.description: Execute Python code in sandbox for advanced data analysis with pandas, numpy, and matplotlib

tools.name: analyze_business_data
tools.description: Perform statistical analysis (profiling, trends, correlations) on business data

tools.name: run_database_query
tools.description: Execute custom SQL SELECT queries for complex data analysis

tools.name: create_visualization
tools.description: Create charts and visualizations from data with inline display

tools.name: create_dashboard
tools.description: Create custom dashboards for business intelligence

tools.name: create_dashboard_chart
tools.description: Create dashboard charts for data visualization

tools.name: list_user_dashboards
tools.description: List all dashboards accessible to the current user
